## TransactableLiquity.unstakeLQTY() method

Withdraw LQTY from staking.

**Signature:**

```typescript
unstakeLQTY(amount: Decimalish): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

amount


</td><td>

[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>

Amount of LQTY to withdraw.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

As a side-effect, the transaction will also pay out the LQTY stake's [collateral gain](./lib-base.lqtystake.collateralgain.md) and [DebtToken gain](./lib-base.lqtystake.debttokengain.md)<!-- -->.
